title: [K-12] Blended Learning Design and Evaluation Using Multimodal Learning Analytics (MMLA)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational learning analytics concepts and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Application of MMLA (Mobile-Mediated Language Assessment) in a blended environment combining BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) data collection with classroom observation materials

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles of MMLA and methods for integrating physical/digital learning environment data.
Learners can execute a process to analyze learning design contexts by linking classroom observation (CO) with digital log data.
Learners can develop MMLA-based customized assessment strategies by applying co-design methodologies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
